name: Bloodsucking Blues
description:
Currently in development! Sound design + more models and pop up text features to be added soon! (12/12/19)

Ever wanted to wander around the apartment of a moody vampire? Enjoy chatting with Judah, a gay vampire eager to share his past with a willing mortal. As the night goes on, learn more about his history and see what he has to say!

Controls: WASD to move, Shift to sprint, Space to jump, E to interact and progress dialogue.
